summary: This test module verifies the functionality of the MODFLOW 6 model splitter, checking that model partition information is correctly created and that models can be sliced into sub‑models for both structured and unstructured grids, including scenarios with auxiliary variables, and confirming that the resulting sub‑models remain runnable.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of model partitioning and slicing tools used in groundwater simulation workflows, enabling reliable modular or parallel execution of MODFLOW 6 models.
